events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving a rear-end collision on the highway.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to the vehicle collision description.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the customer's auto accident claim promptly.
The customer received acknowledgment of their claim submission and agent assignment.
Request sent to the customer for police report, vehicle photos, and repair estimates.
Customer submitted all requested documents including the police report and repair quotes.
Investigation began to verify the accident details and damages to the vehicle.
Investigation concluded confirming the accident circumstances as reported by the customer.
A settlement offer was calculated and proposed based on the damage assessment and policy terms.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement amount and process clarity.
The claim was officially approved, confirming coverage and payment eligibility.
Insurance payment was issued electronically to cover the vehicle repair costs as settled.
The claim case was closed following successful payment and confirmation from the customer.
All claim documents and records were archived for future reference and compliance requirements.
